objectArray.text: The Professor is studying ways of summoning warriors at will.
[Polka Lynn Wood] Liz's older brother and a former acrobat. Becomes a Grave Knight to find the kidnapped Liz. (From Polka Arc)
[Liz Lynn Wood] Polka's younger sister and a former acrobat. Kidnapped by someone. She is cheerful and outgoing. (From Polka Arc)
[Shen Du] An astronomer known as "The Eyes of the Owl". In search of his missing master. (From Polka Arc)
[Valdor] Commissioner of the Grave Knights. Admires Boston, legendary hero of the Lobsters. (From Polka Arc)
[Faerie (Brownie)] A foulmouthed yet compassionate faerie. Likes to boss Polka around. (From Polka Arc)
[Tu Kwai] Leader of Dae, a major power of the east. Capable of quick attacks despite being tiny. (From Polka Arc)
[Zenon Ausbach] Descendant of Mikhail and current Marquis of Loanne. First to sense the changes of the world. (From Polka Arc)
[The Wicked Witch of the East] A mysterious witch who lives in the caverns in the east with hundreds of her "daughters". (From Polka Arc)
[Don Scaccini] A big-time dealer who operates out of the Great Arch. Enjoys collecting endangered species. (From Polka Arc)
[Barthelemy] Ringmaster of the circus in which Polka and Liz performed. There is a secret side of him. (From Polka Arc)
[Madeleine] A Gessian swordswoman who is said to be the reincarnation of Khalid. Seeks the legendary sword Khamsin. (From Polka Arc)
[The Rise of Morastrum] A calamity that occurs once every 300 years, killing all life born in that year.
[Maritime Mobile Fortress Vanguard] One of the cities that appeared in RS3. Has developed into a bustling business district.
[The Seven Heroes] Characters from Romancing SaGa 2. Includes Wagnas, Noel, Rocbouquet, Subier, Dantarg, Bokhohn, and Kzinssie.
[The Four Sinistrals] Characters from Romancing SaGa 3. Includes Earthlord Alloces, Dragonlord Byunei, Sealord Forneus, and Firelord Aunus.
[Liam] A student at Vanguard's Marquisate University. Jack of all trades, master of none. Fancies mechs. (From Liam Arc)
[Candy] A monster who loves food, especially sweets. (From Liam Arc)
[Darius] Leader of Survey Group Clavis. Those around him admire him for his big-brotherly personality and sense of justice. (From Liam Arc)
[Anya] A mysterious girl encountered in another world. Seems to be searching for something but doesn't talk about it much. (From Liam Arc)
[Survey Group Clavis] A group composed of adventurers, researchers, and Otherworld Warriors. Investigating the mystery of the Sleepers. (From Liam Arc)
[Gods of Evil] Characters from Romancing SaGa and Romancing SaGa -Minstrel Song-. Includes Death, Saruin, and Schirach.
[Jo] Full name Josephine, Liz's daughter. Has the spell power to tame even the dragon of the lake, Genryu. (From Polka Arc)
[Bertrand] Nicknamed Bert, Liz's son. Someone took him away shortly after he was born. (From Polka Arc)
[Igomahl] An Abyssal being who can shift shape and manipulate memories by assimilating with other beings. (From Polka Arc)
[The Five Divine Beasts] Beasts who serve the Outer Supreme. They are Hiveris, Hardy, Merlot-Syrah, Orlette, and Razem. (From Liam Arc)
[Liao Yu] Researcher and inventor at Clavis. Curious and fascinated by life. (From Liam Arc)
[BaIC] A combat support mech at Clavis. Dreams of becoming an ultra high-spec mech. (From Liam Arc)
[Shirei] A wandering minstrel who sings of Otherworld Warriors. His looks and voice captivate the masses. (From Shirei Arc)
Study your enemy and target their weaknesses when choosing which skills to use.
You can copy a party from the Edit Parties screen.
[Weak] means that the target of an attack is weak to that attack, so it causes more damage.
[Resist] means that the target of an attack is resistant to that attack, so it causes less damage.
Start off by battling over and over, which will increase your characters' attributes.
During a battle, tap and hold on an enemy to see more information about them.
Characters that are away on Expeditions can also participate in battles.
When a character joins you, it is recommended to send them on Expeditions first.
If your party gets defeated, try doing an instant Expedition.
If your party gets defeated, try enhancing your Styles.
Getting defeated or retreating doesn't consume much stamina.
Sending out multiple characters on Expeditions is recommended.
When warriors join you, it's important to train them first.
When you use a skill, you might [Grasp] a new one.
At the end of a battle, you might [Learn] a new spell.
During an OverDrive Combo, your attributes increase temporarily.
Using a skill or spell may result in them ranking up.
You can increase Combat Power by winning battles or enhancing Styles, etc.
Which skills and spells to inherit is up to you.
[STR] Affects attacks with Swords, G. Swords, Axes, Clubs, M. Arts, Spears, etc.
[END] Affects defense against skills.
[DEX] Affects attack accuracy, as well as attacks with Guns, S. Swords, and Bows.
[AGI] Affects evasion, turn order, M. Arts attacks, and attack accuracy.
[INT] Affects chance of inflicting status ailments and resistance/attribute changes, spell strength/accuracy, etc.
[WIL] Affects chance of resisting status ailments and resistance/attribute changes, and defense against spells.
[LOV] One may feel love through spending a lot of time with another.
[CHA] Affects the success rate of inflicting status ailments and the recovery amount from healing.
Hector can inherit Orion's skills and spells.
Alkaiser can inherit Red's skills and spells.
Black can inherit Herman's skills and spells.
Study your enemy and target their weaknesses when choosing which skills to use.
[Weak] means that the target of an attack is weak to that attack, so it causes more damage.
[Resist] means that the target of an attack is resistant to that attack, so it causes less damage.

[END] Affects defense against skills.
[DEX] Affects attack accuracy, as well as attacks with Guns, S. Swords, and Bows.

[CHA] Affects the success rate of inflicting status ailments and the recovery amount from healing.
If your party gets defeated, try changing your [Formation]. Characters can show their strength better in the right position.
When you awaken a skill or spell, you can activate it in fewer turns.
When it comes to skills and spells, there are close range attacks and long range attacks.
Attribute gains vary according to Style growth tendency.
Styles that learn recovery spells should be developed sooner rather than later.
Accessories mainly provide resistance against status ailments.
Skeletal enemies (such as Eerie Skull) are weak to heat and sun attacks.
Fish enemies (such as Barbarricuda) are weak to blunt, cold and lightning attacks.
Snake enemies (such as Viper) are weak to cold and lightning attacks.
Beastman enemies (such as Hooligan) are weak to heat, cold and lightning attacks.
Plant enemies (such as Creeper) are weak to heat attacks.
Human enemies (such as Jester) are weak to slash and shadow attacks.
Aquatic enemies (such as Sea Slug) are weak to pierce, cold and lightning attacks.
Fae enemies (such as Sidhe) are weak to slash attacks.
Insect enemies (such as Bee) are weak to blunt and cold attacks.
Undead enemies (such as Corpse) are weak to pierce, heat and sun attacks.
Demon enemies (such as Jam) are weak to sun attacks.
Inorganic enemies (such as Gel) are weak to heat, cold, lightning, sun and shadow attacks.
Avian enemies (such as Bat) are weak to pierce attacks.
Reptile/Amphibian enemies (such as Wrapper) are weak to cold and lightning attacks.
As your Master Level increases, so does the damage you do with each weapon type.
Your Master Level increases as you develop Styles. The more Styles you develop, the better.
Use Styles that provide resistance against powerful foes' attacks in battles.
Even if your Life Points (LP) reach 0, they'll recover after the battle.
Hector can inherit Orion's skills and spells.
Alkaiser can inherit Red's skills and spells.
Black can inherit Herman's skills and spells.
Awakening skills and spells is always a good idea.
Don't forget that skills and spells can be inherited.
Remember to pay attention to your abilities while battling.
Some Styles will likely need to change how they fight upon inheriting certain skills or spells.
Defend better against attacks by choosing your armor according to your enemy.
If your attributes start to increase less frequently, try developing other characters instead.
During a battle, tap and hold on an enemy to see more information about them.
Styles that can learn recovery spells should be developed sooner rather than later.
Characters that are away on Expeditions can also participate in battles.
When a skill or spell's rank goes up, so does its efficacy.

Black can inherit Herman's skills and spells.
Body Armor mainly reduces slash and blunt damage.
Heavy Armor mainly reduces slash and pierce damage.
Light Armor mainly reduces blunt and pierce damage.
Robes mainly reduce heat, cold and lightning damage.
Helmets (Gear) reduce blunt damage.
Gloves (Gear) reduce slash damage.
Greaves (Gear) reduce pierce damage.
Shirts (Gear) reduce sun and shadow damage.

If you want to get stronger, going on Expeditions repeatedly is recommended!
Start using [Instant Expedition Tickets] from the beginning of the game.
If you want to get stronger, going on Expeditions repeatedly is recommended!
Start using [Instant Expedition Tickets] from the beginning of the game.
[Auto Rematch] can be used on certain quests once cleared. There is a certain number of "Daily Auto Rematches" you can use every day.
If your party gets defeated, try enhancing your equipment. Powered-up equipment can increase Combat Power.
[Forge Equipment] to get strong weapons.
The [Spiral Corridor] is reset every month. First Completion Rewards can be obtained every month.
You can get specific Style Pieces in [Training]. You should make sure to get Style Pieces regularly.
Promote a character's Dojo Rank in [Promotion Exam]. The attributes of each Style of the character will be increased.
There are formidable enemies in [Remembrance Battle]. Clear battles to get special weapons that can be evolved.
Register your favorite equipment sets in [Favorite Equipment].
Raising your Adventurer Rank has several benefits, including an increase in your maximum stamina and the number of daily auto rematches.
In [Beginner's Plains] of [General Records], you can receive one-time rewards for party enhancement when you clear a battle quest.
The [Romancing Shop] is stocked with a diverse array of goods.
Go to [Score Battle Dojo] in [General Records] to check out the highest damage your party can deal. Aim higher!
Some SS weapons can become SSS weapons through [Super Evolution] at the [Forge].
Completing Start Dash Missions is a good place to start.
By playing quests in stages, you may discover new stages.
